article_title: On the Law: Employee timekeeping and overtime liability
article_text:
North Andover, MA (01845)

Today

A mix of clouds and sun with a slight chance of thunderstorms this afternoon. High 86F. Winds ESE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%..

Tonight

Partly cloudy. A stray shower or thunderstorm is possible. Low 66F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph.

article_metadata.author: On the Law  Maureen Louise Pomeroy

og.description: Employers may find themselves on the wrong side of the law when they fail to pay their hourly employees overtime.
